name: Weight Gate
description:
This was my first Minijam, the theme was wisdom and it required weight as a mechanic.

I attempted to make a puzzle game, where you adjust your resistances but increase your weight, or vice versa. However, I overscoped it dramatically for a game jam that I started 36 hours in!

Enjoy 6 chambers displaying the mechanics I put together with all the haste of a man in the last four hours of a game jam!

This was a wonderful learning experience.
